summary: The Ayleid Pearl of the north.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia]                                          [size=5]AYLEID RUINS OF ARASHAI[/size][/font]

                      [img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/91dff17e9d1f7149aefc6e5b4312cdbd/tumblr_og8mrddyKH1rido3to1_500.gif[/img]﻿

  "Today I arrived at the excavation site, after a long and tiresome journey to this southern hold of Skyrim. It will be the resting day before I start my work. So good I was granted with the news that all goes as scheduled, the workers have already dug deep into those dark tunnels. The white-marbled debris indicates that somewhere beneath the earth here we will find the halls of Arashai, the first Ayleid city besieged by the joint forces of the nords and imperials led by queen Alessia . As a proud altmer and true descendant of the Ayleids I feel honored to have The college of Sapiarchs sponsoring  this investigation, as my hope is to unveil one of the shadiest chapters in our history: the alliance forged between queen Alessia  and the nords to free the imperials from the ayleids. The rest of the story, we all know very well: the allied forces headed south and besieged Sancre Tor, Ninendava, Ceyatatar, Narlemae, Celediil, Vahtacen, Sedor... I grew with my father telling me stories about those epic battles. That`s what encouraged me to become an archeologist. Of course I got upset because my ancestors lost the war, but I am just so in love with history that I just could not feel less fascinated than I am to be here today.  I know it all started here in Arashai. It´s up to me now the chance uncover the secrets of the "Ayleid Pearl of the North", as it was known."

                                                          ﻿[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/71c6d90a8a85ea0488999d58c3d8a865/tumblr_p14xhn8mY31qk66q6o1_400.gif[/img]                

This is a 10-level ayleid dungeon built with abidala Building system. It is non-linear, and most levels can be skipped: follow the cells with "Arashai" in its name to go straight to the point, but if you want to explore the entire dungeon explore the others first, leave these cells for later. Some hallways were put above others, be careful with your exploration: your map may be misleading.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  [img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/843527cdfead2ff8b3e67a333ad9e4b3/tumblr_n13icfpmAM1rhvpkuo2_500.gif[/img]
  Read the journal on the table at the dungeon´s entrance to learn about Arashai and its history. Defeat the king of Arashai to get a fabulous treasure, plus a magic portal which will take you back to the 1st level. But watch out: his Majesty is mean, and he will not give up his treasures easily.


********************************************************************************************************* KNOWN BUGS AND ISSUES                                   
*********************************************************************************************************

  Abidala Building System is a "crude" resource with small glitches such as collision property and light reflection issues. I tried to "patch" things with collision boxes and rubble, but maybe you will notice something weird.
You should report me any bug you find.

                        [img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/574940377e3e602da40eb07a14cb8288/tumblr_og8mrddyKH1rido3to2_500.gif[/img]

*********************************************************************************************************
INSTALLATION                                             
*********************************************************************************************************

Extract Arashai.esp and Arashai.bsa to your "Data" folder.

Add a check to Arashai. esp in your game data  folder to activate the mod... and play!

Install the updates when they are released.

*********************************************************************************************************
UNINSTALLATION                                             
*********************************************************************************************************

Just delete Arashai.esp and Arashai.bsa and... tchau tchau, the mod is gone.

[center]﻿[/center]                                                            [img]https://thumbs.gfycat.com/DazzlingSnappyAmericancicada-max-1mb.gif[/img]

*********************************************************************************************************  CREDITS                                               
*********************************************************************************************************

This mod uses assets from the following authors:

 ANTIWOMAAGNOT
 APEPIODUAT  
 ESTROYA
 IMPERIALSOCIETY
 INSANITY SORROW

 MIHAIL

 TAMIRA 
 THE_FUNKTASM
 VARLAISARAN
 WALKINGMASSOFCOMPLEXES
 3AMT

author: Leodoidao

files.name: 1.2 Update
files.changelogHtml:
-Fixed a fissure in Ayleid Excavation Site and another one in Thermae of Arashai.
-Added 2 new models of statues to the dungeon. When you uninstall the mod you should also delete the files: meshes/oaristys/the witcher/statues/AAAYStatuelovers meshes/oaristys/the witcher/statues/AAAYStatuewithbird

files.name: 1.3 Update
files.changelogHtml:
-Fixed some more small holes and displaced objects
-Renamed the 2 shrines after the thermae "Stone carved shrine" and "cave shrine" to avoid confusion
-Changed clutter for some cells.

files.name: Update 1.4
files.changelogHtml:
-Fixed varla stone base glitch.
-Added a bonus outdoor area: a waterfall, reached from the Thermae of Arashai.

files.name: 1.5 Update
files.changelogHtml:
- Improved the waterfall area.
- Improved clutter and fixed glitches in several cells.

files.name: 1.6 Update
files.changelogHtml:
- Fixed bug which prevented from swimming in some spots.
- Added giant Auriel statues (Yes, some Ayleids also worshipped Auriel) to outdoor areas.

files.name: 1.7 Update
files.changelogHtml:
- Fixed bird glitch.
- Fixed last holes.
- Added another bonus level, a small cave linked to Arashai.

files.name: 1.7 Update
files.changelogHtml:
- Fixed bird glitch.
- Fixed last holes.
- Added another bonus level, a small cave linked to Arashai.

files.name: 1.8 update
files.changelogHtml: - Added vampire queen armor to the vampira. Path to the new mesh: Data/meshes/actors/vampire lord/character assets/sexyvampirelordfemalequeenarmor

files.name: 1.9 Update
files.changelogHtml: - Fixed wall glitch in western shrine, north markers in both eastern and western shrines and misplaced pillars in treasure room.
